inputs.name: _payee
inputs.description: The address whose funds will be withdrawn and transferred to.

abiDocs.name: withdraw
abiDocs.details: Withdraw accumulated balance for a payee.

abiDocs.name: renounceOwnership
abiDocs.details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.
abiDocs.notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

inputs.name: _newOwner
inputs.description: The address to transfer ownership to.

abiDocs.name: transferOwnership
abiDocs.details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

inputs.name: _payee
inputs.description: The destination address of the funds.

abiDocs.name: deposit
abiDocs.details: Stores the sent amount as credit to be withdrawn.
